assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Rane Brake Lining Limited manufactures and markets auto components to original equipment manufacturers and aftermarket customers in India and internationally. It offers friction material products, such as linings, disc pads, clutch facings, clutch buttons, and brake shoes and blocks for passenger vehicles, utility vehicles, commercial vehicles, two wheelers, and railways. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Rane Brake Products Limited and changed its name to Rane Brake Lining Limited in February 2008. The company was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Chennai, India.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. M. A. P. Sridhar Kumar
companyOfficers.title: Sr. VP of Fin. & CFO

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Siva  Chandrasekaran
companyOfficers.title: Exec. VP of Secretarial and Legal
